org.xclcharts.chart

Class CustomLineData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xclcharts.chart.CustomLineData

  • public class CustomLineData
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    XiongChuanLiang
    (xcl_168@aliyun.com)
    ClassName:
    CustomLineData
    Description:
    定制线基类用于强调标准,底线之类,也可用于显示计算出来的平均线之类
